title: Mountain Climbing Friends?
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Eh? You want to build up stamina by mountain climbing again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes. It is as you said, Umi-san. It was very harsh when I did it with you before, but I improved in various areas. That’s why I thought it’d be good if I trained like that regularly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Shioriko!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Y-, yeah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Ah, sorry, I didn’t mean to yell.... You have a very.... very good spirit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Then, let’s make a plan. Mountain climbing starts with planning. In other words, our training also starts with planning....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Wow.... So not only it trains your physical and mental strength, but also your thinking ability by making plans, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>That’s right! That’s absolutely right! Come Shioriko! Let us plan our mountain cli-.... training~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Okay! I’ll be in your care!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
